headline: Do You Believe in the Long-Term Growth Potential of Align Technology (ALGN)?
summary: Ruane, Cunniff LP, an investment adviser managing Sequoia Strategy, released its Q4 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. Sequoia Strategy returned 9% in Q4 compared to 2.7% for the S&P 500 Index. The Strategy delivered a return of 21.9% in 2025 versus 17.9% for the Index. In a year […]

headline: HSBC Upgrades Align Technology to Buy, Raises Price Target to $200
summary: HSBC  analyst Sidharth Sahoo   upgrades Align Technology (NASDAQ:ALGN) from Hold to Buy and raises the price target from $150 to $200.
